author: mpetrunic
content:
Hmm here is the proposal for getting ssz state from api. Basically client sends Accept header with content type he wishes to receive (default json). Swagger supports this nicely. I've put `application/octet-stream` as response content type so if link is opened in browser it will ask to save those bytes in file.
Let me know what do you think?
https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-APIs/pull/119
